ok.. you probably installed nvidia-current which is an older driver .. not "current".. there is a ppa for the latest driver.  Once the ppa is listed in your sources then update upgrade and it should pull the driver in.. it's also called nvidia-current.. the ppa is x-swat.. google it.. not sure of it's exact location.
